summary: What happens when you throw 2 guys who hate each other together? Add for good measure a beauty and a gangster and the trouble is no one can be trusted.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Saif Ali Khan|Kareena Kapoor|Anil Kapoor|Vishal C. Bhardwaj|Mukesh Bhatt|Rajesh Jais|Ehsan Khan|Ibrahim Ali Khan|Sanjay Mishra|Manoj Pahwa|Arjun Sablok|Benazir Shaikh|Yashpal Sharma|Tarun Shukla
title: Tashan
